name: Easify WooCommerce Connector
author: John Blakeman

sections.description:
Note: This plugin is for the older version of Easify (Version 3). If you are using the latest version of Easify (Version 4) you will need to use the Easify Server WooCommerce plugin instead.

Gives Easify V3 users the ability to control parts of their WooCommerce enabled WordPress website via Easify V3.

WooCommerce orders are automatically raised in Easify V3 ready for processing.

Synchronising your product database and stock levels across Easify V3 and WooCommerce.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater
  • Some payment gateways require fsockopen support (for IPN access)
  • WooCommerce 2.6.2
  • Easify V3.85
  • EASU V1.0.0.3

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of the Easify WooCommerce Connector, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Easify WooCommerce Connector” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

What does the Easify WooCommerce Connector do?

Gives Easify users the ability to control parts of their WooCommerce enabled WordPress website via Easify.

WooCommerce orders are automatically raised in Easify ready for processing.

Synchronising your product database and stock levels across Easify and WooCommerce.

What is Easify?

Easify is a software application for small business that runs on PCs or laptops with Microsoft Windows.

It provides you with stock control, invoicing, quoting, purchasing, EPOS software and more…

All this comes in one easy to use yet powerful software package, and at an amazingly low one off fee.

Where do I get support?

http://www.easify.co.uk/support/contact
support@easify.co.uk
+44 (0)1305 303040

short_description: Connects Easify V3.x Business Management, EPOS (Electronic Point of Sale), stock control and invoicing software to WooCommerce.
description:
Note: This plugin is for the older version of Easify (Version 3). If you are using the latest version of Easify (Version 4) you will need to use the Easify Server WooCommerce plugin instead.

Gives Easify V3 users the ability to control parts of their WooCommerce enabled WordPress website via Easify V3.

screenshots.caption: Easify, help you run your business all from a single easy to use software package.
Setup, the options needed to connect your Easify server to WooCommerce.
Orders, these settings are used when orders are automatically raised in Easify.
Customers, these settings are used when customers are automatically raised in Easify.
Shipping, these settings will be used to link Easify products to WooCommerce shipping options.
Payment, these settings will be used when payments are automatically raise in Easify.
Logging, configure how you want Easify to report on its activities and possible errors.
